fields.name: ossid
fields.doc: Unique identifier of the Element Network Manager

fields.name: dnPrefix
fields.doc: DN prefix for the sending network node

fields.name: nodeFDN
fields.doc: Local DN of the sending network node

fields.name: elementType
fields.doc: Type of sending network node (e.g. PCC or PCG)

fields.name: moFdn
fields.doc: DN of the resource being measured

fields.name: snssai
fields.doc: Unique identifier of the 5G network slice

fields.name: ropBeginTime
fields.doc: Collection begin timestamp in UTC format

fields.name: ropEndTime
fields.doc: Collection end timestamp in UTC format

fields.name: suspect
fields.doc: Reliability flag for collected data. Default is false (reliable data).

fields.doc: localDn

fields.name: measObjLdn
fields.doc: measObjLdn

fields.doc: Number of AMF subscribers
